name: X METAVERSE PRO
description: X METAVERSE PRO is a super ecology built on Web 3.0 and DeFi 2.0 architecture. It is committed to building a new business world of 3D immersive metaverse - X METAWORLD. X METAVERSE PRO collaborates with global technology enthusiasts, financial experts, business elites, and Dao members to develop Metaverse Investment Bank, NFT Trading Market, Metaverse Mall, Alliance Reserve Bureau, Dex, GameFi, SocialFi, Metaverse City Cluster, and other ecological applications

name: Monetars
description: Monetars is one of the biggest online marketing platforms where you can earn money. Register and try games or apps. Take part in different surveys and earn money from home easily.

name: GVI
description: Global Village International is one of Bangladesh's leading premium import, marketing, and distribution company. The website is for product portfolio and shares information about the company.

name: Save The Student
description: Save the Student is a student based tech platform which aims to provide multiple services via online such as E-learning, Gyan Baksho, Study Abroad, Business innovation, Fund raising. Save the Student saves the career of many students by developing their soft skills as well as standard of education through several ways.

name: Video Quiz
description: A Complete Single Page Application (SPA) made with Firebase using React JS.

name: RMS
description: RMS (Result Management System) is a program that use to manage academic examination results. It's can calculate marks and generate the result by itself. And can publish the result to the students. After entering every subjectâ€™s mark admin can public the result page to the student and students can search their results by themself.

name: LMS
description: LMS (Library Management System) is a smart web-based Library management system. LMS is so fast and easy to use. Here we can store our book data with images and authors by category. And we can filter books by authors and category.
